data.title: Gauhati University Campus – Euphemos
data.text:
Gauhati University founded by ideologist and philanthropist Krishna Kanta Handiqui, we strive to be one of the premier institutions of higher education in Northeast India and one of the most sought-after postgraduate institutions. A place which created many illustrious sons and daughters of Assam none other than Bharat Ratna Dr Bhupen Hazarika, noted litterateur and Gyanpeeth Award Winner Mamoni Raisom Goswami and many more. Being the oldest and the largest university in the entire Northeast, the university represents the academic and cultural background of the region, on which the other academic institutions of Northeast India started their journey. Being the pioneer educational institute, it extends its hand holding support to all subsequent academic institutions in this region.

We stand on rank 36th among all the universities in the country and rank 64th among all Higher Educational Institutes (HEIs) of the country as per rankings provided by NIRF 2022 rankings. We are also placed within top 0.88% of all participating institutes in the NIRF 2022 rankings. For the year 2022 we were placed within 501-550 range in the QS World Asia Rankings.

Also known as the land of “Krishnachura” situated in the banks of river Brahmaputra and in a city that beholds countless dreams. Gauhati University doesn’t only enhance academic excellence, but we also endow thousands of experiences and memories to cherish for a life time. A campus filled with nature’s beautiful creations, peers from different parts of the country, faculties that are always ready to provide all sorts of support and above all, a platform to show your most real self to the world out there. Gauhati University has been serving as the Think Tank for development of entire Assamese Society throughout the history of the university and we plan on to keep the legacy alive.
